page.title: 17ASIAN SHOPS IN PETERBOROUGH.
page.content: Peterborough has a considerable Asian community concentrated around the Gladstone St. area of the city. Here, to meet their daily needs,can be found four asian shops. Many of the asian people in the area use these shops. Although the asian shops sell English food, the asians mainly buy asian food. Three of the four shops surveyed were owned and run by asians. The main foods sold were spices, curry,halal meat and rice. Halal meat is special because only one person,appointed by the mosque, can slaughter the animals and this is then sold to the community. The shops also serve as meeting places for the local community, and every time we went in these shops we found a large group of asians chatting and discussing local events.
